eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Clark, NV; AT 07:47 AM ON SEP 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:17 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THIS IS A TEST OF THE SOUTHERN NEVADA EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.  

THIS MESSAGE IS ORIGINATING FROM THE CITY OF LAS VEGAS EMERGENCY OPERATIONS CENTER IN LAS VEGAS, NEVADA.  

THIS SYSTEM IS USED FOR WARNINGS AND ESSENTIAL SAFETY INFORMATION.

DURING EMERGENCIES, TUNE TO A PARTICIPATING RADIO OR TELEVISION STATION FOR DIRECTIONS, SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS AND OTHER OFFICIAL INFORMATION. 

THIS CONCLUDES THIS TEST OF THE SOUTHERN NEVADA EMERGENCY ALERT SYSTEM.
